title: JOUR JOUR 461-0-20 How 21st Century Media Work

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Can mass media still make money? Is the future of news 100% mobile ? or 100% on Facebook? Is content still king ? and if not, who are the new rulers? And can society really afford the cost of "free"? Explore these questions, and examine the possible answers, in this course that is designed to prepare you for whatever changes come next in the media business, and to be able to figure out which of the dozen daily changes actually matter. You'll also study how an individual journalist can use technology and marketing tools to offset, or even leverage, the impact of the disruption that has changed journalism over the past two decades; how to think innovatively and to innovate; and how to make sure your work gets through to today's distracted news audiences.
